## v0.2.0 (2025-12-11)

### Documentation

- Add AI agent guidelines for semantic release

### Features

- Migrate to pure Lua DSL and add Electron-based IDE

### Breaking Changes

- Workflow format changed from YAML+Lua (.tyml) to pure Lua DSL (.tac.lua)
